Actions.Name: Bloody Hacking
Effects: Bloodied or dazed foes take 2 damage again after this ability resolves.

Actions.Name: Life Drain
Actions.Effects: An adjacent foe sacrifices 3. If they are bloodied, they sacrifice 6 instead, and the [name] gains evasion until the start of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Horrible Twitching
Actions.Description: The [name] gains aura 1. Foes in the aura gain +1 curse on attacks. Allies in the aura gain the dodge trait. The [name] loses this stance if it ends its turn with no foes in the aura.

Actions.Name: Bone Chilling Scream
Actions.Description: The [name] releases a bone chilling scream, a burst 1 area effect. Characters in the area must save or take 2[D]+[fray], or [D]+[fray] on a successful save.
